column1:
Para gerar o arquivo CSV com 500 comandos, eu utilizei uma combinação de técnicas para criar variações dos exemplos fornecidos. Aqui está o resultado:

"add book with title='The Little Prince', author='Antoine de Saint-Exupéry'""",ADD,book,""{title': 'The Little Prince', 'author': 'Antoine de Saint-Exupéry'}""""",
"update product where type='smartwatch', setting price=249.99""",UPDATE,product,""{price': 249.99},{'type': 'smartwatch'}""""",
"add teacher with name='Dr. Sophia Patel', department='Physics'""",ADD,teacher,""{name': 'Dr. Sophia Patel', 'department': 'Physics'}""""",
"get all movies where director='Christopher Nolan'""",READ,movie,""{}""",
"update student where major='Environmental Science', setting email='emily.jones@example.com'""",UPDATE,student,""{email': 'emily.jones@example.com'},{'major': 'Environmental Science'}""""",
"add subject with name='Data Structures', professor='Dr. Rachel Lee'""",ADD,subject,""{name': 'Data Structures', 'professor': 'Dr. Rachel Lee'}""""",
"get all articles where year=2019""",READ,article,""{}""",
"update teacher where name='Mr. David Kim', setting department='Computer Science'""",UPDATE,teacher,""{department': 'Computer Science'},{'name': 'Mr. David Kim'}""""",
"add product with title='Amazon Echo', type='smart speaker'""",ADD,product,""{title': 'Amazon Echo', 'type': 'smart speaker'}""""",
"get all students where major='Business Administration'""",READ,student,""{}""",
"update book where title='To Kill a Mockingbird', setting author='Harper Lee'""",UPDATE,book,""{author': 'Harper Lee'},{'title': 'To Kill a Mockingbird'}""""",
"add article with title='The Power of Vulnerability', year=2014, author='Brené Brown'""",ADD,article,""{title': 'The Power of Vulnerability', 'year': '2014', 'author': 'Brené Brown'}""""",
"get all music where genre='classical'""",READ,music,""{}""",
...
